content: We may have a usecase that can be satisfied using the NamingSystem resource. This resource is very low maturity and I'd like to know if anyone else is using this on any "real" projects.

The maturity is because we haven't had a connectathon on it - it's not a sufficiently "interesting" resource we could expect much participation. Canada is intending to host all of our identifier systems using that resource but we're still working on "what should the URLs" be and I doubt we'll have the NamingSystem instances in place before the end of this year or some time in the first half of next year.
We used it to alias identifier and codesystem uris
Our search took them into account and would return any resource matching any alias
